message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable considering the inflation.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering I lose less to inflation.
The inflation is hurting us both, Bob. I need a bigger share to make it worthwhile. Let's settle this quickly.
Inflation is indeed hurting us, but I'm more patient than you, it seems. My share should be bigger.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  We're both losing out because of the inflation. Meet me halfway and we can end this.
I'm willing to take the risk of further inflation. You're losing more value than I am, so I'm holding firm.
